casebody.data:
Robert M. Morris and wife, Frances L. MORRIS
v.
DEERFIELD EPISCOPAL RETIREMENT COMMUNITY, INC. No. 598P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 25, 2007. Chris Brown, Robert Dungan, Asheville, for Morris. Christopher T. Graebe, Raleigh, for Retirement Community.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the conditional petition filed on the 5th day of December 2006 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 25th day of May 2007."
